name: Survive
description: SURVIVE is a 6 player multiplayer horror game. Survive a killer in different environments, accomplish objectives and call the police to escape.

name: Dwarven: Mining Dungeons
description: Mining in a team up to four players in various every round changing Dungeons for gold and precious ores. But beware to be to loud. Enemies could lurk around every corner...

name: Anima
description: Immerse yourself in the world of Anima, a powerful entity with magical powers. Help Anima in her quest to obtain freedom from the prison she's been trapped by her own kind.

name: Rolling Balls
description: This is a physics-based ball racing game where you compete against your friends in Coop-Mode or if you choose to play alone there is an option to race against Time in the Singleplayer-Mode.

name: Ghost College: Hotel Fright - Chapter 1
description: The strange death of a roommate, the sudden "friendly" Mr. Wang, as well as the out-of-place hotel, so that the ghost college has new clues, as well as a new mystery, has been chasing the female ghost, what is hidden behind, with the passage of time, everything is gradually clear

name: Dungeon Explorer
description: Dungeon explorer - A brave knight goes to a dangerous dungeon after he heard that the ancient evil has awakened again and is trying to break through to the surface .. Stop the hordes of opponents and their master before it's too late, the fate of the world is in your hands!

name: Planet Collectors: Episode Earth
description: Planet Collectors: Episode Earth is an intense fps shooter game with as much as possible realistic feeling to it. Your goal is collecting enough credits to escape from the map. It is a multiplayer game with 6 players maximum and you can work with other players or betray them, that is up to you.

name: Red Yet Capers: Math vs Mayhem
description: Red Yet Capers is a mix of mathematics, and fun-filled running, jumping, shooting, and ducking. For ages 8 and up.

name: Chester
description: After a tragic accident, you find yourself fighting your worst fears. With your best friend Chester at your side, you'll face down what lurks in the dark.

name: Mission Twentyeight
description: Your country has been captured and alongside other rebels you sabotage the enemy forces in order to aid your military in taking back your land.

name: Codemakers
description: Why are you here? what is going on? how did this happen? all will be answered in due time. until then, you must rebuild what is left of this universe, by harvesting code from the simulator and saving people and places. will you rebuild, or will you fall just like the last iteration?

name: Nekoglai Simulator
description: Help Nekoglai to become the most popular streamer! To achieve that goal you need to collect gnomes, gold and keys.

name: GoodNight
description: A psychological horror game about a girl named Veronica who experiences intense paranormal activities after her family's tragic death in a fire.

name: Battery-out
description: Battery-out is an action platformer with power routing.

name: Master of the Wizards
description: Master of the Wizards is a party card game about powerful Wizards battling, flinging spells and curses at each other, conquering and destroying lands along the way. Play with up to 5 other friends. Each match is very unpredictable, but with a bit of strategy and planning, you can turn the tables.

name: My Little Colony
description: In My Little Colony, you play as an aspiring ant keeper. You will get to choose, build, and expand your colony. But make sure your queen has food and water to keep the colony growing! As players progress food and water will be in more of a demand so spend your coins wisely.

name: Rayman Raving Rabbids 2
description: Rayman Raving Rabbids 2 was also released on PC. Gameplay mechanic was simplified, The Plunger Shooters and minigames with too complicated Wii control were removed, appearance customization was changed to a selection of prepared by developers characters. The number of playable games has been reduced to 16.

name: Rayman Éducation
description:
Rayman Éducation is an educational game based on the universe of Rayman which was intended to be released on the Nintendo DS. It was eventually cancelled for unknown reasons.

The game is only known because of three pieces of concept art. They do not provide a lot of information, other than the fact that some sets of Rayman Éducation were inspired by those of another educational game, Rayman Maternelle.

name: Pirate Shoot
description: Pirate Shoot is the name given to a Flash game made by Ubisoft to promote the release of Rayman 2. It involves the unseen protagonist shooting disembodied Henchman 800 heads.

name: Globber
description: A Flash game titled ‘Globber’ was playable on an official Rayman 2 website, but can no longer be accessed. The name of the minigame is a pun on that of the popular game Frogger, which has similar game mechanics. In Globber, the player controls Globox – presumably before he adopted a new name and gave his old one to his son. Globox must cross a road while avoiding cars, then cross a river by jumping across logs, making sure not to fall in. He can go forwards and backwards, but not left or right. Crossing the road and river once earns the player 10 points; the game's difficulty increases as more points are earned. Globox has three lives; when all three are lost, the game is over.

name: Rayman Raving Rabbids Activity Centre
description: Rayman Raving Rabbids Activity Centre is a spin-off PC game of Rayman Raving Rabbids. It contains 4 small games with interaction of the keyboard and mouse: Flying Rabbids, Freeze!, Paintorama and Hit'em!, a wallpaper studio where the player can create a Rayman Raving Rabbids wallpaper, a video booth where the player can see some of the videos related with the Rayman Raving Rabbids game and a print studio to create stickers, memos, postcards and other things also related with Rayman Raving Rabbids.

name: Rayman Raving Rabbids TV Party
description: This version contains twelve mini-games and sixteen Rabbid characters to unlock. The main goal of the minigames is to collect as most golden carrots as possible and holding most time as possible in order to achieve score records. Each new minigame and new Rabbid characters need fifty golden carrots to unlock.

name: Rayman Raving Rabbids
description: Rayman Raving Rabbids was originally developed as a 3D platform game, under the working title Rayman 4. It was announced by Ubisoft on the 11th of April, 2006, shortly after the cancellation of Phoenix Studio's unrelated Rayman 4 project. Under development by Ubisoft Montpellier, the game was to be a free-roaming action platforming game, in which the player would control Rayman as he battled against an invading army of Rabbids. The game was announced for the PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, Windows, and the Nintendo Wii, which was then codenamed the 'Revolution'.

name: Rayman 4
description: Rayman 4 is an unreleased 3D platform game developed for Ubisoft by Phoenix Studio. Had it not been cancelled, Rayman 4 would have been the first game in the main Rayman series not to be developed by the Ubisoft Montpellier studio.

name: Rayman Adventures
description: Rayman Adventures is a cancelled Rayman video game. Its existence is only known thanks to a teaser trailer dated from the year of 2000. It is not confirmed if this title was the original concept of Rayman 2000 or a different game.

name: Engels met Rayman + Frans met Rayman
description: Compilation of two educational Rayman games: English with Rayman and French with Rayman.

name: Espagnol avec Rayman
description: A port of English with Rayman which teaches Spanish.

name: Allemand avec Rayman
description: A port of English with Rayman which teaches German.

name: French with Rayman
description: A port of English with Rayman which teaches French.

name: Feisty Fauna
description: Feisty Fauna is a ridiculously cute survivors-like / bullet heaven where you're an animal trying to survive. Whether it's by laying traps, being a ninja, or charming minions, you will hunt other cute animals in this eat-or-be-eaten animal world.

name: English with Rayman
description: English with Rayman is an educational 2D platform game, based on the original Rayman. It was designed to teach young children the basics of the English language. It is not to be confused with Rayman Junior, which is an entirely different game. English with Rayman blends the Glade of Dreams with the real world in a way which makes little sense in the context of the series, making numerous references to real-world locations such as Ireland and Scotland. English with Rayman was adapted to teach various other languages under such names as French with Rayman.

name: Rayman 3-Pack
description: Rayman 3-Pack is a compilation of Rayman games which was released to PC in Europe. It includes the original game, Rayman 2 and Rayman M.

name: Rayman Compilation
description: Rayman Compilation is a compilation containing Rayman 60 Levels, a demo of Rayman 2, screensavers and wallpapers.

name: Northern Guilds
description: Northern Guilds is a fun-first, device-agnostic dungeon crawler blockchain MMORPG inspired by your favourite childhood games. In a modern take on the pixel perfect art style of nostalgic adventure games, players and their friends embark on an epic journey into ragnarok.

name: Superhero Fight
description: Sin descripción

name: Rayman 2
description:
Rayman 2 is the cancelled 2D prototype of the game which would later be released as Rayman 2: The Great Escape. This 2D version was very similar to the original game, following the same art style and controls, but with more emphasis on puzzle solving.
The first level of the game was later included as unlockable in the PlayStation version of Rayman 2: The Great Escape.

name: Photography Simulator
description: Learn and explore the world of a professional photography. Join adventure of the wild life. Hunt and shoot best pictures. Sell your photos to magazines, buy and upgrade your gear, and whenever you get tired of waiting for a perfect shot there are ways to brighten your day waiting for you.

name: Evil Maze 2: Lava Dungeon
description: Contains 6 new levels And a brand new lava costume

name: Ab Aeterno
description: Ab Aeterno is a story-driven hardcore survival experience with both well known and brand new survival mechanics designed and polished for VR from the ground up.

name: C.L.A.Y.: The Last Redemption
description: C.L.A.Y.: The Last Redemption is a story-driven role playing game set in a post-post-apocalyptic city. You are the Scion of your tribe, and soon you will be chieftain. Prove yourself to the Elders; lead your crew; build your character and uncover the secret stories of the living city you call home.

name: Starship Survivor
description: Starship Survivor is a thrilling cooperative first-person shooter set onboard the ISS Genesis Four. You and your team have been sent in to investigate lost communications from the orbiting Starship when it becomes apparent that the ships AI systems have gone rogue.

name: Mario Bros.
description: Mario Bros. is the Apple II port of the homonymous arcade game. It was never released.

name: Mario Bros.
description: Mario Bros. is one of the Commodore 64 ports of the homonymous arcade game made by Atarisoft. It was never released, albeit finished. Another unrelated port was eventually released.

name: Dinosaur Race
description: Dinosaur Race is a runner where you need to escape as far as possible from your dinosaur pursuer. After all, the evil mother does not want to part with her eggs. Earn points and use them to buy different weapons and auxiliary items in the store to facilitate this race for survival.

name: Ball Game
description: Ball Game is an upcoming round-based racing game where you and up to 15 other players compete head-to-head to be the fastest on the track (inside of a bouncy ball, of course)

name: Pirate's Gold
description: Pirate's Gold is a unique twist on the sokoban and match-3 genre that challenges your mind!

name: Good Morning, A.I.
description: Shape an Artificial Intelligence, see how your ideas affect future Amsterdam in over 30 endings. Protect your brainchild from quantum hacks in puzzle-tower-defense gameplay. Become Jude, manage their life and relationships and the fate of 2065's Amsterdam in this roleplaying-rich visual novel.

name: Illusion Lands
description: Illusion Lands is a third-person slasher game that combines a gripping storyline and colorful combat. Players take on the role of Erwin, a powerful hunter of the Devourers, giant creatures whose nature remains to be discovered. Explore the vast world of the game and discover its countless secrets

name: Dungeon Voxel
description: Dungeon Voxel is a rogue-like, dungeon crawler game where you try to survive in dungeons filled with fearsome enemies. You will have to destroy the enemies to reach the chests that await you in the dungeons.

name: Tavolga-12
description: A sci-fi online first-person shooter with stealth elements in which you have to survive, fighting other players and artificial intelligence to escape from the dying island. Low ammo, few resources and not much time.

name: Mars parking simulator
description: Mars parking simulator is a racing game. The goal of the game is to put the rover in the parking space within the allotted time. The game has 30 different levels. To go to the next level you need to get at least one star.

name: RingRacer
description: Speed on blazing fast ringbikes through sublime, mathematically inspired tracks that are in symbiosis with players to dynamic tunes that evolve as you progress. Race, shoot and stunt your way through in most dynamic racer you've ever experienced.

name: God Save Us
description: God Save Us is the first real-time strategy game where you can switch from top view to first person view instantly to protect your village from incoming waves of attacks.

name: Myths of Gallantium
description: Myths of Gallantium is an open-world adventure RPG with a focus on exploration and deep character customization. Inspired by the atmosphere of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, and countless possibilities of MMO RPGs.

name: Eternal Dreamers: Sylfie, the Electric
description: Wake Sylfie from her slumber to make her powerful abilities your own! An athlete that has grown bored of her mundane everyday, Sylfie can amass energy to shock foes and deal massive damage, getting the thrill she seeks!

name: Bullfighter Neon
description: Inspired by the "future Cyber-Sport" Arcades of the 90s, Bullfighter Neon is a true retro-future arcade experience, where intense gameplay and frantic action are kings. Jump to the Arena solo or with a friend and face off against mighty CyberBeasts.

name: Hacking Ball 3D
description: The player controls the ball and collects data, solve 3D puzzles with real physics.

name: FourPlay Chess
description: Chess like you have never seen it before. FourPlay Chess is a 4 player party evolution of chess, form a coalition with 2v2 co-op Team Battle mode or go solo in a 4 player free-for-all massacre. Win games, earn higher ranks and display your dominance. Will you become the true King?

name: All Hit All Her: Western City
description: With all hit all her: western city, the adventure continues with all its excitement. With this dlc, you will fight against bandits trying to take over your city in the wild west lands.

name: Earthquake Escape
description: This is an earthquake escape game, about how to move to a safe place at home when an earthquake occurs, and make an earthquake safe escape game. Our protagonist kid is alone at home. Where can he move to hide in order to be safer?

name: Drug Lords
description: A strategy / tower defense where you must move from location to location, buy and sell your "merchandise". While you move you will find random encounters that will help you get more "merchandise", make you lose it, or challenge you even more, by making you defend your life for it.

name: Pax Nova: Tech Supremacy
description: Pax Nova: Tech Supremacy DLC introduces the late game technology Dyson Spheres, a new powerful enemy type, as well as events, weapons, quests, and much more to extend your time in Eos.

name: Sixteen
description: Sixteen is a small casual indie puzzle game similar to a vintage board-game from 1987. Organize the fruits into groups based of what type of fruit. Increased difficulty provides more fruits as well as a larger area to solve.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of the Nam Battlepack 2
description: Heroes of the Nam Battlepack 2 includes 11 scenarios, bringing to life powerfully armed Squads are at the vanguard of all actions, spurred on by daring Leaders.

name: Star Renegades: Prime Dimension
description: It's time to take the fight to the Imperium.

name: Rustler: Vinci
description: Meet famous Leonardo da Vinci and help him test his newest - and deadliest - inventions. Burn everyone with a Flamethrower, shoot them with an Arqebus or ride them over with the all-mighty tank.

name: Blockies VR
description: Blockies VR is a fast-paced, action-puzzle game where you throw projectiles. Destroy block buildings and defend friendly Blockies! Fight against all kinds of enemy monsters by throwing projectiles ranging from a silly pineapple to a destructive blackhole.

name: Klaus Lee: Thunderballs
description: Dive deep through the neon-hued brash and bawdy '80s inspired reimagined classic 2D action-platformer with your favorite Bad*ss German, Klaus Lee! Dust off your jetpack, grab your dynamite and prepare your laser eyes and dive deep into Klaus' first challenging adventure!

name: Sonucido: The Mage - A Dungeon Crawler by Daniel da Silva
description: Sonucido: The Mage is a grid-based, turn-based Dungeon Crawler RPG. Find the mage in the depths of Sonucido!

name: Nino Maze Lofi II
description: Following Nino Maze Lofi line of cute graphics and Lofi music, we now bring Nino Maze Lofi II, a new adventure!

name: Super Night Riders S1
description: A full remake of the 2016 retro-inspired checkpoint arcade racer Super Night Riders.

name: Untitled Survival Game
description: A calm and basic survival game. Smooth out a place for your home, Explore unseen caves or just go fishing.

name: Wars Across the World: Manchuria 1945
description: Manchuria 1945 describes the major Soviet offensive on Japanese occupied Manchuria in 1945. The Red Army must capture as much of the Japanese-controlled Asian mainland as possible before Japan agrees to surrender to the Americans. The Japanese player must try to prevent this at all costs.

name: Wars Across the World: Agathocles 312
description: Agathocles 312 BC is a two players WAW DLC scenario on the war between Syracuse and Carthage for the control of Sicilia between 312 and 305 BC.

name: Wars Across the World: Dublin 1916
description: Dublin 1916 is a simulation of the Easter Rising launched by Irish Republicans in WWI. On Easter Monday 1,200 men, women, and boys of the Irish Volunteers and Irish Citizens Army seized control of Dublin and proclaimed an Irish Republic.

name: Wars Across the World: Cortenuova 1237
description: Cortenuova 1237 is based on the conflict between Guelphs and Ghibellines in XIII century Italy. The former, led by Holy Roman Emperor Frederick II, want to restore Imperial power, while Guelphs, led by Pope Gregory IX, are opposing restoration of same and trying to break Emperor's allies in Italy.

name: Legacy
description: Welcome to Legacy, a medieval, real time strategy game. Here you will use city building and combat tactics to conquer your enemies in hopes to be the last kingdom standing. Good luck!

name: T90 Tank Battle Simulator in VR
description: This is a military war shooting game. Players bring their helmets to the battlefield and drive T90 tanks to fight the enemy courageously in deserts, cities, hills and other scenes, and win the top spot on the turbulent battlefield.

name: OMSI 2: Beijing
description: Welcome to Beijing, China’s capital city! Drive through authentic streets in Beijing on the line 104 and discover both traditional narrow streets – hutongs – as well as teeming areas like downtown, different parks and big residential districts.

name: OMSI 2: Citybus M301
description: The OMSI 2 Add-on Citybus M301 contains the detailed model of a 11 meter long high-floor three-door city bus.

name: OMSI 2: Bolloré-Bluebus-Pack Elektro-Bus
description: The vehicle add-on Bluebus Pack Elektrobus includes a 18-metre articulated version, 12-metre solo bus version (Rennes) and a 12-metre facelift version (Paris).

name: OMSI 2: Irisbus Familie - Low-Entry-Busse
description: Discover the low-floor buses from Irisbus now! The OMSI2 add-on Irisbus Family Low Entry Buses introduces you to this product line in its entirety, including 20 models, with countless customisation options to get as close to reality as possible.

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol.11 - AI-Electric Cars
description: Electric cars - it is impossible to imagine today's streets without them, they will be present more and more often in the future and with the OMSI2 downloadpack Vol. 11 they can now also be seen on the OMSI maps.

name: Shadowrun Chronicles: Boston Lockdown - Missions
description: Random Mission Pack: Boston never sleeps and there are always Nuyen and Karma to be earned for an industrious Shadowrunner. From collecting nanite samples to freeing hostages and defusing bombs, a wealth of repeatable randomized set-ups mission will keep you on your toes and allow you to improve your character and gear.

name: The Cloud Dream of the Nine: A new beginning of a dream
description: This is the spin-off story of the main episode of The Cloud Dream of the Nine where you can target three characters in it. A new story unfolds which is similar yet different from the main story. This is a DLC that can be purchased while possessing the main game.

name: Museum of Other Realities: Canadian Collection
description: The Canadian Collection is an original collection of narrative experiences curated across the Canadian immersive ecosystem. Co-created with Kaleidoscope, in partnership with the National Film Board of Canada and Canada Media Fund, the project will be held from December 17, 2021 to April 29, 2022.

name: Star Age: Space Combat
description: Get ready to fly and challenge your friends in this multiplayer arcade space shooter!

name: Fifefer Island
description: An Economic Adventure awaits! Play this story-driven RPG game to learn new economic skills, make allies, and hopefully not get eaten by bears or lava monsters. Can you survive the Island?

name: Tribal
description: TRIBAL is a Persistent Online Multiplayer Real Time 2D Strategy game where you take the role of Tribe Chieftain and lead your medieval tribe to global domination… or not. The fight for survival goes on with or without you. Prepare your Tribe for greatness and try not to sleep too much.

name: Star Conflict: Mysteries of the Universe. Stage two
description: This pack includesAccess to additional rewards in the event “Mysteries of the Universe. Stage two”.Upon receipt, the next level is immediately unlocked and all rewards of the unlocked levels are available7 days of premium license.

name: Train Sim World 2: London Underground 1938 Stock EMU Loco
description: Experience a true London veteran that harkens back to the Art Deco era, a unit that defined Underground commuting for generations. Mind the gap, as Rivet Games' London Underground 1938 Stock has arrived in Train Sim World 2 for yesteryear Bakerloo Line operations!

name: Train Sim World 2: West Cornwall Local: Penzance - St Austell & St Ives Route
description: Experience the rolling hills and picturesque countryside of the "Great Western", aboard classic British diesel traction, with Rivet Games' West Cornwall Local: Penzance - St Austell & St Ives route.

name: Train Sim World 2: RhB Anniversary Collection
description: Climb aboard an eclectic mix of authentic and detailed Ge 4/4 II locomotives in celebratory liveries, and experience the wintry Alps from the classic observation coach, with Rivet Games' RhB Anniversary Collection for the challenging Arosalinie.

name: Train Sim World 2: DB G6 Diesel Shunter
description: Ready your hard hat and get to work in the yards of Hagen and Wuppertal with TSG's DB G6 Diesel Shunter for Train Sim World 2!

name: Train Sim World 2: DB BR 187 Loco
description: Experience the pinnacle of modern motive power and the latest generation in a long line of classics with Skyhook Games' DB BR 187 for Train Sim World 2!

name: Train Sim World 2: Southern BR Class 313 EMU
description: Pep up operations on the South Coast of England with the classic BR Class 313/2, adorned in the distinctive Southern Coastway livery and ready to serve Brighton, Seaford and beyond in Train Sim World 2: East Coastway.

name: Train Sim World 2: Rush Hour - Nahverkehr Dresden Route
description: Be in control of modern traction, and explore the countryside of Train Sim World 2: Rush Hour - Nahverkehr Dresden.

name: Rebels: Under the Spell of Magic - Chapter 2
description: A Visual Novel game about adventure, fantasy, magic and friendship. This is a continuation of Chapter 1. There are only a few choices that can be made, and some paths to chose from. The decisions do not have an impact on the ending, instead they provide slightly different content.

name: Apocalyptic Adventure: Episode 1
description: A unique twist on survival by combining action, adventure, and strategy in virtual reality. Apocalyptic Adventure is a game where players must manage resources, plan defenses, and explore to survive.

name: Star Melody: Yumemi Dreamer - Chapter 3
description: This is the third chapter of "Star Melody Yumemi Dreamer".

name: Star Melody: Yumemi Dreamer - Chapter 6
description: This is the sixth chapter of Kugado Studio's famed "Kuroneko-san Team".

name: Star Melody: Yumemi Dreamer - Chapter 7
description: This is the seventh chapter of Kugado Studio's famed "Kuroneko-san Team".

name: Star Melody: Yumemi Dreamer - Chapter 8
description: This is the eighth chapter of Kugado Studio's famed "Kuroneko-san Team".

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Imagination
description: Puzzles with a lot of imagination!

name: Chronicon: Ancient Beasts
description: The first DLC to Chronicon expands upon the endgame content with Expeditions, Passive Skill Tree, Artifact items, Mythical crafting, and Beast companions with inventory space!

name: Tick
description: A first-person horror game, the player will play a character who enters the dreamland, gather the necessary props to escape in the dreamland, and be careful of monsters during the chase. If you really can't escape, you can try to enter a deeper dreamland (but you may not be alone there)

name: VHS Platform: 2D
description: Our player will need to use his skills and go through all the obstacles present in each stage. With each stage that the player passes, the levels will become more and more difficult, are you up for the challenge?

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - A Visitor from Distant Lands
description: Acquire a new pet – a tiny sovereign dragon. His great wisdom will help you succeed at all Knowledge and Lore skill checks

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Paint of War
description: This free DLC includes additional options for customizing the character's appearance: new types of tattoos, and body art, and the ability to change eye color.

name: Rising Sun VR
description: Step into the role of being a keeper of your own Japanese garden. Players can relax peacefully among this Japanese Strolling Garden, by completing day to day tasks and enjoying the sights and landmarks.

name: A Pirate's Pleasure: Bonus Stories
description: Three all-new stories of pirate adventure!

name: Super Egg 2020
description: Super Egg 2020 is the player will play a super egg throwing animal, the egg will explode, destroy the small monster, also can climb out of the small monster, in a variety of obstacles, reasonable through the egg blasting.

name: Box Cats Puzzle: Halloween
description: Halloween is coming. Our great lord witch cat comes here. Faithful servants, hand over your candy quickly. The witch cat will give you happiness ~!

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - Airport Ben Gurion
description: Ben Gurion International Airport (IATA: TLV, ICAO: LLBG) (commonly known by its Hebrew acronym as Natbag) is the largest airport in Israel. It is said to be the world's most secure airport.

name: X-Plane 11: Verticalsim - KMSY: New Orleans International Airport XP
description: Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport is an Class B International Airport located in New Orleans, Lousiana.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - Airport Menorca
description: The popular holiday island Menorca is now also available for X-Plane 11. The current aerial images come in a resolution of 50cm/pixel down to 25cm/pixel in the airport area.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - Airport Kassel
description: Kassel-Calden Airport is a relatively young commercial airport that was opened on April 4, 2013, located approx. 13.5 km northwest of the city of Kassel. Since January 2015, the airport has referred itself as “Kassel Airport”.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - Airport Stuttgart
description: Airport Stuttgart XP brings the international airport of the state capital of Baden-Wuerttemberg as a native add-on to the flight simulator X-Plane 11.

name: X-Plane 11: Verticalsim - KORF: Norfolk International Airport XP
description: The Norfolk International Airport is located 3 miles away from downtown Norfolk, Virginia. Allegiant, American, Delta, Frontier, Southwest and United offer convenient access to hundreds of cities worldwide.

name: X-Plane 11: Verticalsim - KFAY: Fayetteville Regional Airport XP
description: Get the feel of being a regional airline pilot with a visit to Fayetteville Regional Airport! A small town airport located in North Carolina. The airport has two runways and is served by a two-concourse terminal for commercial aviation and one separate terminal for general aviation traffic.

name: X-Plane 11: Verticalsim - KSRQ: Sarasota-Bradenton International Airport XP
description: Sarasota-Bradenton International Airport is located within three jurisdictions: Sarasota County, the city limits of Sarasota, and Manatee County. Owned by the Sarasota Manatee Airport Authority, it is 3 miles (4.8 km) north of downtown Sarasota and 6 miles (9.7 km) south of Bradenton.

name: X-Plane 11: Verticalsim - KISP: Long Island MacArthur Airport XP
description: Long Island MacArthur Airport (ICAO: KISP) is located in Ronkonkoma, New York on Long Island and serves American Eagle, Frontier and Southwest airlines with regularly scheduled flights to mostly locations in Florida.

name: X-Plane 11: Verticalsim - KPVD: T. F. Green Airport XP
description: The T. F. Green International Airport (KPVD) is a public international airport in Warwick, Rhode Island, six miles (10 km) south of the state’s capital and largest city of Providence.

name: X-Plane 11: Verticalsim - KCRP: Corpus Christi International Airport XP
description: Corpus Christi International Airport is your perfect regional airport getaway. Promising interesting approaches over the beautiful coastlines of Southeastern Texas, this small airport provides you a scenic destination to get away from the business of the larger major airports.

name: X-Plane 11: FeelThere - KRDU: Raleigh Durham
description: (IATA: RDU, ICAO: KRDU, FAA LID: RDU), locally known by its IATA code RDU, is the main airport serving Raleigh, Durham, and the surrounding Research Triangle region of North Carolina.

name: X-Plane 11: Verticalsim - KGEG: Spokane International Airport XP
description: The Spokane International Airport is a commercial airport approximately 5 miles (8 km) west of downtown Spokane, Washington.

name: X-Plane 11: Verticalsim - KMYR: Myrtle Beach International Airport XP
description: Myrtle Beach International Airport is a county-owned public-use airport located near the vacation hotspot Myrtle Beach, SC. It was once known as Myrtle Beach Air Force Base, featuring two fighter wings of the USAF.

name: X-Plane 11: Verticalsim - KBWI: Baltimore Professional Edition XP
description: The Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport is a major Southwest Airlines hub and has many international destinations to Europe, Canada, and central America via Southwest, British Airways, Condor, Icelandair, WOW, and AMC.

name: Embr: Secret Hosr
description: In this free 4 player multiplayer mode, work as a team to save clients from fire and defuse bombs planted by rival corporate spies. But keep an eye on those teammates... not all of them can be trusted.

name: Mystery Case Files: Incident at Pendle Tower - Collector's Edition
description: A Dark Past Lies Within…

name: Rustler: Murder Madness
description: Hire different mercenaries to fight in your name. Get new weapons and ride a chariot or a new horse with bonus ammo. Complete the new MurderFest challenges. Become the Murder Man nobody wants, but so many deserve.

name: WhenNightComes
description: Take the role of a solider in this surviving game that fight with tides of creatures in total dark night. Different kinds of creatures show up in suddenly ,you need to act very carefully.A lot of weapons can be found in the map ,and they will help a lot to defeat the creatures.

name: The Game of Life 2: Lunar Age
description: Launch into THE GAME OF LIFE 2 Lunar Age! Experience a world of adventure and discovery. Build your life in orbit, from the Moon Base to the Biodome City, all the way to the Advanced Alien Civilisation! The choices are all yours on the furthest frontier!

name: Finley's: The Colour of Radiation
description: A puzzle solving game of laser light beams, refraction, reflection and mixing. Pit your wits against the maniacal artificial intelligence Finley in this reimagining of the unknown and very secret 1960’s human perception tests carried out in top secret hidden bunker laboratories.

name: Gravity Bot
description: In this Sci-Fi Physics-Based Puzzle Game, you control a little robot with a big power. Use your power of changing gravity to stop the space pirates and return all the stolen goods to their owners.

name: Zhazari VR
description: Zhazari is a game that will take you to a beautiful but dark world. You will come face to face with the menacing monsters that have taken over the kingdom, through the king's bad decisions. You are the last hope to bring peace back to the towns. Do you have the courage to stand up to fight?

name: Apsis
description: Survive as long as possible in this hardcore Arcade Throwback. Avoid Asteroids and the Planets while collecting as many water filled Comets as possible!

name: BadTrip
description: Experience action survival horror game in dark scary forest like never before in unprecedented BADTRIP game. Detailed graphics, tense third-person action, and masterful storytelling - forest has never felt more scary

name: Brolections 2022
description: (Please read out loud, this is a french game ;) ) Een present-dai france, la mothair of all elecshe-ons eez approachéng, le presidential brulecshé-on. Ze oppairtunitay fair all la most viulent bros een la republic to (con)conquair potential votairs by fairce.

name: Sea Dogs
description: 1654 AC. The Caribbean. Take a role of a young French noble who arrived at the New World to assist his brother. What seemed to be a simple family matter, turned into a lifelong adventure! Fierce battles, deadly adversaries, heartwarming friendship, beautiful romance, and A LOT of treasures.

name: SUL: Schutze Unser Land 3D
description: This is a first-person shooter that tackles an alternate reality where Brazil is being swallowed up by a growing Integralist occupation. You fight for southern popular resistance against Brazilian integralist tyranny!

name: Alan and the kid
description: VR versus PC. Big VS Small ! Get the drop on your opponent using Guns, Rockets, Traps, Sleeper agents and a variety of other methods.Alan is a self-aware pawn on the Kids play table. Jetpacks, Oil slicks, smoke grenades, Table manipulation, Use every item at your disposal!

name: Island World
description: Island World is a 3D pixel world construction and resource management simulation game: reasonable planning blocks, placing resources, assigning tasks, and regularly electing appropriate leaders to lead the islanders to better develop and organize the army to defend the island.

name: Play: An Interactive Piece
description: In Play - An Interactive Piece, you’re an actor in a company staging a piece in which you’re the main character. The entire adventure will take place on the stage where the performance is happening. Feel the thrill of the stage, from the opening of the curtains to the emotion of the final bow.

name: Game Over
description: the story will be told from the perspective of a game developer throughout the Great Depression from its beginning to its end, and how it affected him personally.

name: Astral
description: ASTRAL - Dream Or Reality is a horror adventure with survival aspects which lets the player slip into the role of Adam.

name: Soundsxworld
description: Soundsxworld is a new and exciting way to experience new exclusive music, art and entertainment events in a changing and expanding metaverse.

name: RoboLingo
description: RoboLingo is a fun rhythm game that teaches you new languages! RoboLingo uses a unique patented technology that will help you learn English, Spanish, German, French, Italian, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, or Korean.

name: Find the Murderer
description: Someone committed murder in the village. The detective arrives at the crime scene. Help him find the murderer.

name: MadMan
description: Trapped inside an abandoned mental asylum with a psychopathic killer lurking about, you are forced to explore the facility armed with only your wits to survive. With an ever evolving A.I you are never safe, every move could be your last. Will you escape to tell the tale or fall victim to the madness

name: Frontier of Fortune
description: Frontier of Fortune is the 10th episode of Fortune Chronicles, a strategic game of territorial dispute among countries/kingdoms in Fortune. Experience the fun and impressive Fortune series that has continued for 12 years.

name: GravityPunk
description: This is a platform jumping game with unique gameplay. In the world of punk, you can control and rotate space, but you can never escape the shackles of gravity. Explore secrets, and find out the truth. Release your soul bound by gravity.

name: The Choice VR
description: DEXTER STUDIOS' 3RD VR WEBTOON! A CONJOINED TWINS, HA-EUN AND YE-EUN, BORN WITH A SHARED HEART! WHO WILL … WIN THE HEART?

name: Pick the Lock
description: Pick The Lock is a game of reaction speed and an endless number of levels.

name: Dragon Realms: Towers 'n' Dragons
description: Take on the roles of two ambitious strategists and defend your country against dragons and rebels in this story based tower defense game! Keep an eye out for hidden secrets and act wisely because who knows how the story might end.

name: Dimension Dash
description: Jump, dash, slam and grapple your way through engaging levels with branching paths in this action platformer. Earn currency and unlock new abilities to improve your rank. Do you have what it takes?

name: Vitality Girl II: Fire
description: is a cartoon style bullet screen shooting game. The game adopts the horizontal version of the game, and players will take various adventures on an illusory continent.

name: Project: Sphere
description: Arcade video game in 3D, of frenetic action, in which you will have several modes to test your skills, maps that will change as they look, maps that will change their structures, skins for your sphere! Fight to survive or kill everything you can in this game full of spheres!

name: Ninjas Against the Machines
description: The world is depending on you, Ninja! Powerful machines have traveled through time to destroy all of humanity! Equipped with your bo staff, your javelin, and your wits, you must take the machines head on, utilizing any and all futuristic technology you can find along the way.

name: Parachuter
description: With a limited number of moves, move through the selection of the direction of gravity. Defeat all enemies and escape this strange world.

name: Break Through the Illusion
description: "Break Through The Illusion" is a dungeon barrage shooting game. The protagonist Mick needs to try to pass one room after another, make full use of the specific weapons and limited bullets in his hand to kill the monsters in these rooms, in order to reach the boss room for the final battle.

name: Stamp
description: "Stamp" is a very exciting shooter where your main job is to KILL zombies and complete the main task. Meanwhile you have a lot of stuff to try like perks, new weapons or side quests.

name: Brutal Rifters
description: Embark on an adventure with Marcus and Lunatea through various universes conquered by the forces of the dark god in search of the goddess who can stop him and face your friends in a frantic multiplayer mode for up to four players with a wide assortment of characters with unique abilities.

name: Pedro and Sofia's Nuclear Winter
description: A fantasy adventure across a nuclear-torn America! Play as Pedro and Sofia and set out on a quest in this open-world, 3D/2D role-playing game!

name: First Parsec
description: Venture out on an ambitious mission across the galaxy with a simple goal - to save your home planet. Bask in the dazzling light of distant stars, flashes of plasma cannons, and explosions of enemy ships! This action-packed space fighting simulator is just the thing for a lazy Saturday night!

name: Battle of Rebels
description: Go for the high score and fight off waves of zombies in this single-player third-person and first-person shooter game. Battle of Rebels plays to your strengths and gives you the freedom to do more and be more while carving your own path to victory.

name: Mechaguard
description: Mechaguard is an arena shooter where you have to create the perfect vehicle to destroy a huge horde of monsters.

name: SpaceDominator
description: SpaceDominator is strategy fantasy open world where you can discover universe! Contact other civilizations, make friends or enemies, start trading or fighting, expand your own area or help others to expand, increase your intelligence level.. and much more! Follow developing

name: Healer & Phoenix
description: A visual novel with a pet healing mini-game about a mythical animal veterinarian, a magnificent phoenix, love and saving the world. Will you heal all the animals of a mysterious magical sickness or will the world be destroyed by evil magic? Find love, make choices, and get one of the 10+ endings.

name: Hand Cannon: Janky Reality
description: Take on the role of Jack Jackson, and complete the simulation in this action platformer. Featuring 12 levels, 10 bosses, 9 unique weapons, and a Metroidvania New Game Plus. After you complete the main game, create your own levels, and share them with your friends. Are you up to the challenge?

name: Danger of Loss
description: DANGER OF LOSS - This is a side view puzzle game about a boy who got lost in the forest and you need to do everything so that he finds his way home.

name: Stapel
description: The Stapel is a game of your reaction speed. You stack rectangular figures one on top of the other by timely fixation at the moment the figure passes over the previous one.

name: The Giant of Torridge Island
description: Help or hinder Torridge Island as you take control of a Giant in this sandbox of villagers, wildlife and natural disasters. Will the villagers praise you and beg for your return in the morning, or pray that you never reappear.

name: Valkalim
description: In Valkalim, you are in an unknown place tamed by enemies. There is something wrong with the sun, find out what happened and save the world from eternal darkness with the help of your axe and shield.

name: Clay Shooter
description: You can experience clay shooting with this game. realistic reload, Aim after grabbing with both hands, Firing action and pleasure. Try both (match the color clay, quickly match the clay with two feet).

name: SynCo 2321
description: SynCo 2321 is a thrilling third-person action RPG shooter. Explore stylized environments ranging from ruined cities to alien worlds. Uncover the greatest plot to ever threaten humanity as you battle your way from an underground bunker across the galaxy.

name: Jump Like An Egyptian
description: Our game is an endless platform game. You have to jump to the next platform within 20 seconds by racing against the clock. Your goal is to reach the highest score by passing the most platforms in the shortest time.

name: Initium Legenda
description: "A new and grand fantasy world that has never existed before opens." "You're the adventurer who will start the legend with Siryu!" Initium Legenda is the first authentic SRPG game developed and launched by Legenda Inc.

name: I Need a Name
description: I Need a Name is a homage to classic RPG Maker horror games where your name will make an impact on the events you encounter as you travel through the abstract environment you have escaped to.

name: Free for Fall
description: Free for Fall is a multiplayer game where the characters are dragged by portals into an alternative and full of randomness world. Jump and fight with your friends to see who can get out first.

name: Three Sons
description: A world blanketed by endless snow...Experience this interactive adventure from the POV of more than 3 different characters whose choices will determine the fate of a dying world.

name: Hyde
description: Hyde is an adventure puzzle game, where you discover ancient ruins but , it turns out this ruins are keeping more secrets than it looks like. I am working alone, the whole map in the game is fully custom made.

name: Once in my Head
description: The creators can also lose the ground under their feet.

name: Wobbl
description: Wobbl is a charming platformer about editing the level while playing it, to your advantage. The level is your playground - use Edit Wands in a selection of colourful levels to help you carve a path.

name: Punji VR
description: Inspired by classic tactical shooters of the late 90's and early 00's, PunjiVR was designed from the ground up to bring that feel to modern technology. This is not just "another VR shooter" or a tech demo. The jungle wants you dead, will you give in?

name: Survive the Backrooms!
description: Inspired by the wildly popular Backrooms mystery, make your way through various backrooms in an attempt to escape the nightmare you find yourself in. (1-8 Players)

name: Paint to Pixel
description: Paint To Pixel is a Virtual Reality exhibition that charts the history of UK graffiti. It features interviews with prominent UK artists and personal photo archives that cover 6 decades of graffiti writing.

name: Grove: Nostalgia's End
description: A story rich retro RPG adventure with a lot of attitude! Life in Vapor City was always strange, but after the arrival of a mysterious record, Alex and Eddie's lives are about to change forever.

name: Occulto
description: Occulto is an indie adventure game with a focus on artistic hand-drawn visuals and a non verbal game play, set in a fantasy world. Guide Eliot through riddles, mysteries, puzzles, strange creatures, faraway places and help him find his master!

name: Legend of Radiance
description: Start on your fantasy adventure in this completely nonlinear souls-like! Place Life Stones in the world to create your own 'bonfires' as you cut through the challenging enemies, and seek out the six Divine Rings to stop the Demon King!

name: Heaven Keepers
description: Heaven keepers - Heaven is sending you gifts.. collect them all in this quirky game inspired by classic arcade games from the 80s!

name: Laboratory of Nightmares
description: You are one of the best fighters of the GIBAR unit, and therefore you were sent to destroy a secret laboratory guarded by armed soldiers. This is a dynamic game with a top view in which you have to survive in a secret laboratory and find a way out of it.

name: Heroes of the Sacred Tree
description: Heroes of the sacred tree is a game that mixes beat em up with shotter and platforms.

name: Parasite
description: You wake up in some strange underground laboratory and you don't remember anything, you must find answers and find who you are and what you doing there. You are alone there or you are not?

name: Donkey Kong Junior
description: This is the BBC Micro port of the homonymous arcade game. It was finished, but never released.

name: Donkey Kong Junior
description: This is the Coleco Adam port of the homonymous arcade game.

name: Vy Worlds
description: Vy Worlds is a game where you can Play and Create your own games! Enter Vy Worlds, play games made by us, the community, and yourself!

name: Game with Car
description: It's a game, with a car

name: Animaddicts 2
description: Animaddicts 2 is a Beat Em Up Game based on the 80s Cartoon for 1-4 players.

name: Faraway: Jungle Escape
description: Faraway: Jungle Escape is a relaxing adventure escape game full of new puzzles to solve. The second sequel of the Faraway trilogy.

name: Rabbit & Dominoes
description: Help the rabbit collect the easter eggs, on this relaxing game, making combinations with the dominoes pieces.

name: Snow Plow
description: Drive snow plows in this immersive, moody and realistic simulation game that takes place during a peaceful snow storm. You mission is to keep the roads safe under changing conditions while managing your business and dealing with unforeseen events.

name: Drag Battle Top Fuel
description: Drag Battle Top Fuel is a racing simulation where you race a Top Fuel dragster over a quarter mile drag strip. The action is fast pace and intense, and things can change in a split second. Reaction times will be the difference between winning, loosing and crashing.

name: Three Mazeketeers
description: Help these girls to finish the task by journeying through the labyrinth. Use different forms to see different perspectives and to tackle various challenges. Solve puzzles and find the cause by utilizing all the abilities you have.

name: Coins, Chests and Loot
description: Looking for a clicker-style incremental game with active, strategic skill-based gameplay instead of idling around doing nothing? You've come to the right place! Successfully complete bullet-hell minigames to open chests and earn currency to buy upgrades!

name: Neko-Mimi Sweet Housemates Vol. 1
description: What is one to do when face to face with a cat-eared, winged angel? Life will never be the same when the angel, Mint, moves in and becomes your new housemate. Follow Mint, a popular girl from the doujin circle "Animal Herb," as she stars in this brand new, heart-warmingly comedic game!

name: Inu: A Glimpse of Infinity
description: INU is an atmospheric exploration adventure in an infinite 3D fractal universe. “Journey” meets “No Man’s Sky” in truly infinite, mesmerizing alien landscapes – not created more like discovered.

name: Ratomon 2
description: Ratomon 2 is a continuation of medieval top-down adventure to stop the Plague. Investigate random generated dungeons, eliminate rat hordes and other villains, who stand behind the disease.

name: Cosmo Clash
description: Play as one of 4 trigger happy animals, in a primal duel for honor and glory! Bring your friends locally, or duke it out on Steam Remote Play! 2 to 4 Players can shoot, dash and bump their way to quick victory! You'll need speed, reflexes and alterness to be king of Cosmo Clash!

name: Paper Birds
description: Paper Birds is a 30 minute interactive story about a young musician in search of true inspiration. Starring Ed Norton, Joss Stone, and Archie Yates, this VR film offers unique moments of interactivity, inviting you to conduct music, unlock portals, light up the invisible world, and more.

name: Looking for Imago
description: Looking for Imago is a peaceful but yet challenging puzzle-platformer in which you will be led to tame insects & natural elements to progress in your quest. Get ready to discover an original way to interact with the critters of this world.

name: Hyper Hook
description: HyperHook is a grappling hook centric VR arcade game set in fractured landscapes full of vibrant colors. Rank up as the top hook expert, or build your own maps to create the ultimate grappling hook experience.

name: Deep Night Runner
description: Deep night runner is a game for fans of the runner genre that will allow you to enjoy the gameplay endlessly! Run through the night plains, dodge ghosts and collect coins on your way

name: Sould Dub
description: Sould Dub is a casual 2D shooter. A cosmic threat is approaching the earth, huge asteroids are flying to wipe everything to smithereens. Fly up and knock down asteroids and dodge them, go through all the bosses and protect the planet

name: Fishy Business
description: Fishy Business - You are a cool mafia fish who goes on another ordinary fish business. Take your gun and shoot all opponents while collecting their skulls in this crazy platformer!

name: Your courier is on their way!
description: Why does your courier always show late?

name: Jungle Runner
description: JUNGLE RUNNER this is a classic runner game with a procedurally generated world and various bonuses, but in cinematic graphics. For those who don't know: a runner is a game in which the goal is to run as far as possible from the start, and dodge various obstacles along the way.

name: BeatMotor
description: rhythm stepping + fancy motorcycle + rubbing moves = BeatMotor

name: Broken Banners
description: Defend your kingdom from evil monsters in this combination of Tower Defense and Auto Battle. Place your defenses and stop the forces of evil from reaching your kingdom.

name: Camping Builder
description: Build the camping of your dreams on a tropical island. Discover the secrets of this beautiful, wild place. Work in harmony with nature and the island will reward you, but ignore the rules and be ready to face the consequences.

name: Hovercraft Racing
description: Race for the fastest time in this difficult time attack racing game, with more than 11 tracks and 3 varied hovercrafts to choose from. or play with a friend in local multiplayer.

name: Ancient Islands
description: Old-school, hard tower-defense mixed with economy elements. It features complex skill trees, resource trading, building your own village, and setting individual tactics for each tower. Can you defend what you've built from hordes of enemies? Visit Ancient Islands and test your tactical sense!

name: Tower of Ascension
description: Tower of Ascension is a roguelite tower defense game. Grow your build, solve levels in unique ways, and ascend the tower.

name: Blinky
description: You play as a small-eyed creature who needs to shoot bacteria falling on the island.

name: Blind Dreams
description: A game about a colorblind girl, stuck within a dreamlike, colorless world.

name: OddFauna: Secret of the Terrabeast
description: Craft, forage & farm across a whimsical land with new friends in this open world sandbox adventure. What world will you create?

name: Plentypede
description: Don't let Urcash and his troops get past the outpost. The peace and safety of mankind is in your hands

name: Zombodrive
description: Get in the car and go on a dangerous adventure in the post-apocalyptic world

name: Dream Busters
description: Nostalgic and New style. A new sensation! Retro fantasy shooter

name: The Asfrixa
description: Trapped in an installation made for "Asfrixa's", you'll have to go through your worst nightmares and puzzles to find your way out before being consumed by the shadows along with the place.

name: Debt
description: Owen finds himself immersed in fear and tension, unaware that the adventure that began with the quest for cursed gold in the mine he entered because of his debt could end up ruining his life.

name: You Are Not Bunnygirl
description: You Are NOT Bunnygirl is an RPG about self-care! Manage Physical and Emotional Health as you guide Bunnygirl through a lab of malfunctioning robots. You can't actually lose, because it's a game, but you should protect Bunnygirl anyways because she might not appreciate it if you don't.

name: A Second Before the War
description: When people destroyed themselves in WWIII, new war was started by.. animals... Lead one of the five sides and save (or conquer - your choice) the world in this simple turn-based strategy. How about a small fight?

name: G.E.T.
description: G.E.T. (Gather, Explore, Technologize) is a 3D first person open world adventure-survival game. On your journey you will progress through different ages, beginning from the stone age and finishing in the far future.

name: Steel Shell
description: Steel Shell - This is a third-person shooter, in the style of dark cyberpunk. There is no linear plot, quests, and pumping. Just grab the first cannon you see and scrap those damn droids!

name: SworLd
description: SworLd is a VR Sci-Fi combat game based on physics. Create weapons of any shape and defeat your enemies.

name: Sinthetic
description: Step into the dystopia that is Vacancy City. In an open-world, action-RPG featuring a combination of elements from Western and Japanese RPGs. Join the ragtag squad of unlikely allies led by the veteran-turned-mercenary Fawke Harvey as they apprehend crime while they uncover a conspiracy.

name: Escape to School
description: Escape To School is an action game where you have to get into a school and get all requiered items to leave it. There is a tutorial where you will learn the mechanics of the gameplay. The final goal is to Escape the school in short time. You can try to beat your highscore every time you are playing.

name: Natalia
description: Natalia lived a free-spirited life while running a shop for everything. One day under Natalia, a strange work comes in. It was to hire a maid exclusively for the second prince Creto from the common people. Can Natalia do this work involving the royal family properly? Visual novel.

name: Find a way out: Abode of darkness.
description: A game in the genre: First Person Shooter, RPG, Puzzle. You'll have to walk around the building to get essential items. Also you have to save battery charge because it runs out very fast. And the worst thing you'll face with is contaminated which is far more dangerous than zombies!

name: Black Magic Gamebox
description: The Black Magic Gamebox is a collection of games featuring The Arcade game: They Came From Earth...Again, the FPS, RPG: The Lightbringer, The RPG Party Game: Mages and Monsters, and the Multiplayer Dice game: Dungeon Dice Monsters.

name: Any World
description: Any World is a game that tells about the adventure of an alien who was forced to go to the planet Emria and explore it. Emria is not a simple planet. It is inhabited by various creatures, both friendly and hostile. Our hero will meet everyone.

name: I am not legend
description: A killing time zombie game, the goal is simple, but it is a little difficult and needs some luck. Kill all zombies in the scene, but they double the remaining number every 10 minutes. Do you kill zombies first or find items first? Skill, strategy and luck are important. Can you accept the challenge?

name: Lofi Hollow
description: A moddable ASCII semi-casual life simulator with permadeath options and multiplayer.

name: Coral Drive
description: Coral Drive is a "SF factory labor simulation" set in the future. Here, you work on ship manufacturing and save money to get out of platform workers.

name: Breadskate
description: BRDSKT (BREADSKATE) is a freeroam skating game but you play as bread and ducks with guns have invaded your world. Simply give your newly baken bread loafs some wheels and watch them go skating and exploring the world. Truly the miracle of life of bread!

name: TagHunter
description: TagHunter is Super Cool Adventure with Power and Treasure.

name: Lectro
description: Can you help Lectro escape the scientists who have held him captive in ZYER Labs? Help Lectro traverse through unique and exhilarating challenges in vast, beautiful environments to gain his freedom.

name: Starbase Gunship
description: Starbase Gunship places you in the seat of a weapons officer on a state-of-the-art Gunship as you defend a remote outpost from an Alien invasion fleet. With access to laser cannons, missiles, miniguns and nuclear warheads, you are the last line of defense between humanity and the alien invaders.

name: Druid: Test of faith
description: Make a move on a fascinating journey through the fantasy world, where interesting encounters and amazing stories await you. This wonderful world is waiting for its hero. Will you have the strength to save him? Or will it all come to an end? It all depends on you!

name: Artificial Entanglement
description: Uncover the mysteries of your existence in an abandoned robotics lab, using precision platforming, magnetism, puzzle solving & death. *hacking sounds* ₲łVɆ ₥Ɇ ₳ ₵Ⱨ₳₦₵Ɇ *hacking sounds*

name: Sports Betting Simulator
description: This is a sports betting simulation game. You have to make bets and earn money in order to achieve set goals and advance in your adventure.

name: Bikini Tits
description: So begins a young man's poolside seduction by two very married ladies! Will he finally get the summer break he's been hoping for?!

name: Shrine of Tails
description: You ended up in an ancient shrine and now you have to figure out what is going on here. Meet the girls living here and show them the power of your "artifact".

name: Battle of the Robots
description: Battle Of The Robots is a spectacular fighting game featuring robots. In this game you will find the most beautiful battles and fights in which you have to fight with robots. Engage in intense close combat and become the king of the martial arts! Defeat them all and stand on the podium of the winner

name: Blade of Si
description: Immerse yourself in this action platformer as you run, jump, slash beasts, solve puzzles, avoid deadly traps, and find hidden treasures in this fairy-tale fantasy world. Take the role of a young girl who finds herself tasked with the burden of saving her realm from evil.

name: PenBall
description: There is a ball on a small field with a top view. Your gate is at the bottom, and your opponent's gate is at the top. Your goal is to score the ball into the opponent's goal.

name: Nia
description: For over a century, a kilometer high crust of ice has covered the earth sealing in and preserving the lost surface world…... Icepunk prospectors scour the frozen tundra, tunneling through the frosty depths to caverns of former cities and malls rich in resources of the before time…..

name: MonoRaceVR
description: MonoRaceVR is a monobike racing in Virtual Reality with unique controls

name: Apocalyptic Slant
description: You are the chosen one to save the world once and for all. Explore the world in this classic FPS shooter game full of bloody zombies, poisonous spiders, and strange-looking creatures. Hopeful citizens are willing to give you everything they have in order to help them survive the apocalypse.

name: Castle in the Sky: Clash of Sky Palace
description: Uncompromising survival & Fantasy World Exploration: You play as Rain, a martial artist who enter a fantasy and unxplored world full of flying rocks, gemstones and surprises. combat with troops that match your survival style. Fight your way out as you unravel the mysteries of this flying island.

name: Fuckling
description: Berk is a wild but genius professional wrestler. He always wins by looking for gaps and using his techniques! Anything goes in the world of underground wrestling. The audience want to see the policewoman being recklessly violated. Make her surrender using shameful dirty skills!

name: Outlandia
description: As a wandering outland wizard (Maegis), you've inadvertently inherited the protection of a small medieval town - Skala Village. Will you be able to develop your skills sufficiently to fend off a growing evil presence, while keeping yourself alive to enjoy the surrounding lush environment?

name: Jammo
description: JAMMO is a MMORPG dungeon crawler game where the goal is to grind dungeons to find loot, upgrade your items, and dominate during the Guild War event. May the strong put up a fight, but the strongest take home the title.

name: Battle Tops
description: Battle Tops is a game where you can design and battle your own battle tops. Or battle them against random tops. There are also lots of customizable options and arenas so you can customize every battle. You can also play with your Twitch viewers.

name: Mugen Journey
description: Accompany your mecha ally in this wild platform game. Dodge the crazy storms to survive and manage to capture all the shards through your path to victory.

name: Emi & The Super Boba
description: Get your game on as Emi jetpacks through a treacherous crystal cave and blasts her way to the top.

name: Planet Boom
description: This chaotic fast-paced planetary defense game will have you shoot, jump, dash, and teleport across a fully destructible planet to fend off enemies flying in from all directions. Switch between multiple unique turrets, upgraded to suit your play style, for eye-popping synergetic plays!

name: Introvert: Consequences
description: Four high school shooting survivors move to a new city and attend a 5-day group therapy program. Discover the secrets, situations, and people that await you in this surreal universe while trying to deal with the guilt and grief caused by the disturbing unforgettable past.

name: MeetCute
description: ​Meet-cute (n) - An amusing or charming first encounter that leads to the development of a romantic relationship

name: A Frail Qubit
description: In a dark, expansive, and unforgiving world, you are a frail Quantum Bit (Qubit) completing mysterious Trials. Explore and conquer your world, inquire about the nature of the Trials, and hatch a plan to escape.

name: Rove: The Wanderer's Tale
description: ROVE is a 'point-n-slash' adventure that blends intense isometric Action RPG gameplay with the charm and puzzles of point-and-click exploration. Dive into a handcrafted world full of fierce enemies and quirky characters, where every choice and combat encounter drives the narrative forward.

name: CrazyParty
description: It is a game where you move in a wide map in all directions using 12 cards of your choice, and play against or cooperate with other players to play mini games.

name: Hell Weaver
description: A small team of paranormal investigators get a tip to search a rumored mansion with a dark history. A hand-drawn action-adventure survival horror game through a eerie mansion filled with disturbing creatures and monstrosities, listening closely will be your guide, light is your key to survival.

name: Inverse Evolver
description: Inverse Evolver is a side-scrolling action that combines roguelike mechanics. Explore different dungeons; use diverse items to form powerful combos, and beat ferocious beasts and bosses.

name: Endragon
description: ENDRAGON is an action RPG in which Mars, a former hero, and Luna, a modern sorceress, travel together to defeat a great evil that has risen from the dead.

name: All to Race
description: Participate in the craziest races organized by a multi-million dollar company that has decided that everyone can participate regardless of the vehicle you compete with, all to race!

name: SteelPinion
description: SteelPinion is a steampunk turn based tactical strategy game with a dash of autobattler. Experience a conspiratorial retelling of history where steampunkery, chivalry, & explosive elemental weaponry prevails. Combat is a mix of well known tactics game genre staples.

name: Shred and Tear: Explosive Kajun
description: An ultraviolent, fast-paced, sexy and gory Hack n' Slash Single player game giving you heavy doses Adrenaline-rush with eye-candy fan service QTE and mecha-waifu.

name: Headpunk: The Comic-Style Battle Chaos
description: Headpunk is a 3D comic-style player vs. player (PvP) deathmatch game. In the game, everyone is the enemy except you. Either shoot enemy players with the Pump Gun or blow their heads with the Rocket Launcher.

name: Spell Crisis
description: Shoot your spells as a little witch in this Mega Man-like action platformer with more exploration elements. Unleash new magic powers, discover new paths, and find rare and hidden items according to your decisions in the game.

name: Campground Owner
description: Become a campground owner. Manage your camping, have guests, count money.

name: Kitty Cat Squash
description: Kitty Cat Squash is a super-casual and relaxing tile merge game! Use your paws to slide the adorable cats across the board and merge the cat tiles; when merged, a new cat appears. You will get hooked attempting to beat your highscore, and trying to discover all 16 cats!

name: Kungen
description: In an silent bamboo environment, Kungen is a challenging sword combat game with short levels, can be played up to 4 players locally with controllers. Paint main characters and fight against the ninjas. The combat system is based on physics.

name: Resistance: The 8th Wave
description: A high-degree-of-freedom strategy FPS shooting game that incorporates Rougelike gameplay. It allows users to pay more attention to the elements of strategy selection while shooting refreshingly, and to grow and learn in the process of continuous challenges and pressure.

name: Demon King
description: Demon King is a multiplayer king-of-the-hill game where you become a powerful demon. Devour other demons to grow, evolve and become the King of hell.

name: Beast Whalers
description: Beast Whalers is a naval roguelike about maneuvering against the wind and managing magical cannons. Explore wild archipelagos and fight against bizarre creatures like mortarfish and flying sharks to find the source of the sudden influx of Corruption.

name: Hum
description: Hum is a dark 2D adventure game with stealth and horror elements set in the bleak, retro-futuristic world of Postapoland. You discover that you cannot die, forever trapped in a nightmarish reality. Explore the world in ever shifting perspectives, reach the reality engine and finally die.

name: Battle Crate Simulator
description: Outfit your crates for battle, explore an open world or watch them fight in sandbox mode!

name: Dark Siege: The First Knight
description: The power of a god is within you in this single player action RPG.

name: Patient Zero
description: Patient Zero is a randomly generated twin-stick shooter game with great emphasis on its roguelike elements. it takes its inspiration from 80s sci-fi and action movies. You play as one of the hazmat crew enlisted in a top-secret adventure to find Patient Zero and stop another deadly virus.

name: Monster of Nyum
description: It is a light RPG that develops a character in a defense method every turn. Grow and overcome the ordeal to obtain the final goal, the Nyum- soul of the Boss-GuiYi.

name: Fast Delivery
description: Fast Delivery is a fun and challenging runner about a food deliverer.

name: Dreadful Wake
description: Dreadful Wake is an intense cooperative first-person shooter. Diverse level design governed by procedural generation. Punishing roguelike-style gameplay, trapped within ever-changing mazes.

name: Rockstar Life
description: Rockstar Life is a casual life simulation game. In this game you get to write songs, organize tours, record singles and albums while you deal with the everyday drama of a wannabe Rockstar through random events.

name: The Knight of Turn
description: Knight of Turn is a board game where the brave knight, imprisoned by the monsters in the deep dungeon, must find freedom and free the kingdom from this threat.

name: Monster Dungeon
description: 《Monster Dungeon》is a pixel Roguelike game, You can collect resources or materials in the game to craft equipment,tools,items, or enter the monster dungeon to challenge powerful monsters.

name: Station 35
description: Station 35 Is a single-player horror game, where the protagonist is the only human left in a space station where an unknown mutated alien escaped. His only chance of survival is to find a way to a space shuttle and escape the station without getting caught by the monster.

name: The Last Days of Sodom
description: Play as a Fallen Angel fighting a host of Enemies through the burning streets of Sodom, the Underworld and Third City of Hell. An exciting third-person shooter where the player will have to use intelligence as well as the trigger finger. Multiple different types of enemies. Original soundtrack.

name: Lady Hunt
description: Lady Hunt is a pixel art action platformer, set in a dark gothic world, where blood has been infected. You play as a huntress, who must find a way to purify this world, inhabited by monsters and beasts.

name: Decimal
description: PROJECT TARS is a fast-paced 1st person parkour shooter in space. Experiment with gravity aboard a stranded spaceship. Play a protagonist who has to rebuild his memories of what happened and who he is.

name: Land of Foot
description: Play together in this local co-op party where the shoes are in control! Guaranteed boots, battles, and bosses in your hunt for the evil Pegleg.

name: Neighbors
description: Know your neighbors. Find the truth. Betray them. Experience the nightmare of the Salem Witch Trials in this horror story based on true events.

name: Dead Tunnel
description: Dead Tunnel is 2D Shooter Platformer Roguelite game.

name: TealGrounds
description: TealGrounds is a third-person, puzzle, horror game with randomly generated world that takes place in an underground workshop of a scientist known as Dr Willis. Your goal is to solve puzzles, avoid aggressive machines and find the exit.

name: Diner Together
description: Diner Together VR is a multiplayer co-op diner management simulator!

name: Catacombs of the Yokai
description: Catacombs of the Yokai is an indie single player psychological survival horror game in which you must explore the twisted depths of randomly generated catacombs filled with enemies inspired by Japanese/Taiwanese urban legends and myths.

name: Wicked Paradise
description: Wicked Paradise is a point and click visual novel, with mysterious and naughty story.

name: Oh Boy More Cheese
description: Oh boy more cheesy fun with 4 different modes find your way through the mazes and hope to escape before your opponent play with cats on or off or maybe find the cheese and unlock the doors or do it all whatever you choose it will be cheesy fun

name: Stay with Me!: An Alien Abduction Story
description: Psychological horror game with a first person view, you will play a young woman who has lost her way and who apparently has been kidnapped by beings that are not from this world

name: Where is He
description: Where is He Is a Simple Psychological Indie Horror Game, Where the player Unravel the mystery Of WHO IS HE And What is your Objective.

name: Akuma: Cyberpunk Rhythm Action
description: Discover the dark side of the futuristic tech city, where the virtual has merged with the real. Surpass the other hackers of the city. Witness musical gameplay entwine with a fascinating story of fame, success, and the price you have to pay for it.

name: Puputan Legend VR
description: Puputan Legend VR Patih Kebo Iwa - is a custom multiplayer online battle arena game. Inspired by the history of the archipelago, this game has a puputan war theme with the icon Patih Kebo Iwa, the hero from Bali.

name: Zagamihara
description: Zagamihara puts you in the shoes of Saeko Satō, a senior Student at Sagamihara High School. After the outbreak of a deadly virus that turns people into mindless zombies, you find your self indebted to the fox spirit of a local shrine.

name: Cybertruck Sim
description: Cybertruck Simulator is all about the true reason the vehicle exists, with the most unrealistically accurate physics possible, the goal here is to simply have fun.

name: Chair Spinning Simulator
description: Chair Spinning Simulator is a short quirky game where you have to spin a chair as fast as possible to reach space in under 60 seconds!

name: Dragon Ninja Byoka
description: Dragon Ninja Byoka is a retro, Indie Game platformer akin to the classic 1980s action platformers found on classic consoles, upgraded with bloody combat and pixel-perfect platforming action.

name: Entropic Decay
description: Entropic Decay is a lovingly crafted linear first person shooter driven by narrative, puzzles, combat arenas, and horror sequences. Think the atmosphere of a slow-burn horror inspired walking simulator, fused with the movement and combat options of a shooter...

name: Fast Fruit
description: Panda is hungry - Get him his fruit! Collect the fruit as quickly as possible, and beat your time speedrun style. Run through various levels, get your best segments and beat your previously set times, possibly even setting a World Record!

name: Skullborn
description: Skullborn is an infinite massively multiplayer sandbox game! Begin as a skeleton, fight, gather resources, and craft armor/weapon to upgrade your bones! Explore and team up with other players around the world.

name: Moonhaven
description: You awake on the beach of a haunted island, hungry and alone. Farm, fish, hunt and gather to survive the harsh winters. Help rebuild the town of Moonhaven! Build a home and life for yourself in this survival life sim game.

name: Miraculo Island
description: What you thought would be eight boring days in a remote island will become your worst nightmares. Is the place haunted? Is someone else out there to get us? Is there another motive they brought us here? Depends on you and your mates to survive in this mysterious place.

name: No Humanity 2: Swing'Em Up
description: No Humanity 2 is a rogue-lite bullet hell space adventure RPG, a smash'em up with a twist: you're equipped with a rope-like swingable umbilical cord that can grab, throw and retrieve bizarre weapons. As a space intern, your role includes serving coffees, printing paper, and saving the world.

name: Surreal Deal
description: Join Al, a simple man with a not-so simple job on his two-week journey as a salesman from another dimension. Make choices, sales and friends!

name: Prince Nikolai and the Vampires
description: In this SRPG, play as Prince Nikolai and gather an army of colorful, diverse heroes as he needs to save his kindgom from the threat of his archrival, the arrogant and ambitious vampire Zarius.

name: Space Station 51
description: You are a member of Space Station 51. When you wake up, you find that a zombie virus has broken out on the space station. You need to follow the command of the station master and take a series of actions.

name: Snowstorm of despair
description: Snowstorm of despair is a cooperative survival-horror for up to 8 people. Try to survive in a storm and escape. But who knows what despair can make with people… Communicate and help or betray and deceive!

name: Goodlands
