description: A game about dinos digging up dinos: see if you have what it takes to be a junior paleontologist! Walk, hop, and drive your way around a badlands-inspired environment, meeting cute prehistoric townsfolk and discovering fossils for the Goodlands Natural History Museum.

name: Evolver
description: Evolver blends competitive fighting with quantum-cyberpunk-scifi to create a world of bizarre weapons, unconventional fighting styles, and a wildly eccentric cast.

name: Amaze Adventure
description: Old school console RPG style. Collect cards for use in turn-based card battles. Explore the maze to find puzzle pieces that earn more cards. Discover various puzzle types in each world maze. Choose to help others or not. Play at your own pace. Simple controls. Multiple outcomes to each scenario.

name: Chastity Catastrophe
description: Chastity Catastrophe is a action platformer where instead of beating up enemies, you break your friends out of chastity equipment!

name: Big Drug
description: BIG DRUG - A cooperative adventure game for 1-4 players. Find the criminal before he finds you. Run, search, laugh, but never deceive your brothers.

name: Candy Maker
description: The player will have to lead a difficult life in the production of unusual substances, namely, funny sweets, their sale, laundering dirty money into clean ones. It will also be possible to purchase various goods. But remember, there is a mafia in the game

name: Spooky Bricks
description: Break them bricks but beware of spooky creatures and critters!

name: Who the Fuck Ate Grandma?
description: Time has come to celebrate Grandma's 93rd birthday. Everyone gathered for this memorable family dinner, unfortunately it seems that Grandma is going to be served for dessert ! Inspired by the 90s, discover a new retro point&click adventure game fully drawn in pixelart

name: Oscar's Paradise
description: Oscar's Paradise is a fast paced marble game where you must rush to the end while collecting Oscar's scraps.

name: Scripture
description: The child king actually brought back the gods raised by the priests. He won the respect of the people, but there are those who have their eyes on the throne. Join this adventure as a god.

name: Bolt Action
description: A small, comedic zombie shooter that requires both twitch and strategic skills...One genetically enhanced man along with an inept, insulting, and cowardly scientist must save the World from the invading mutated hordes!

name: Kromaticube
description: KROMATICUBE is a minimalist arcade game where you have to avoid obstacles and listenning to chiptune musics. Just keep alive for at least 60 seconds to complete a level. Easy right ? Maybe not.

name: Spears of a Heart: Elusive Rhythms
description: Start a new life and explore the mysterious island. Meet the people and unleash their secrets while you enjoy tons of rhythm mini-games. Dig the musical dungeons, sing at the karaoke, or synchronize monsters to get crafting resources!

name: Zero Chastity: A Sultry Summer Holiday
description: Zero Chastity: A Sultry Summer Holiday brings you a summer of sex under the sun with four unique & sexy heroines with art from legendary hentai artist, Mizuryu Kei! This game is based off the popular eromanga series of the same title and is both fully-voiced and uncensored.

name: Super Yodelland: Legend of the Katzenbär
description: A nice 2D-Jump-'n'-Run video game for everyone of all ages. Focused on exploring an alpine world full of mysteries.

name: Evade the Taxman
description: A frightening singleplayer survival horror game where you have to find and collect a certain amount of bills spread randomly over several specific areas. Then once you have all the bills, you need to run to the exit.

name: Society
description: Post-apocalyptic shooter in the CIS setting

name: Sanity City
description: Start your new life in a futuristic cyber world. Team up with your friends and go on a raid. Acquire money, equipment and fame.

name: Mech Arena
description: Mech Arena is an arcade shooter game taking place in an arena and dispatched on several rounds. Kill waves of enemies, upgrade your mech and exploit the ever changing ground of the arena to try to become one of its champions.

name: Kuroi Tsubasa: Deluxe Edition
description: This DLC includes an ARTBOOK, HIGH QUALITY WALLPAPERS in 4k resolution and a special character viewer mode in the game!

name: We Were Friends
description: A Battle Royal mode to finally know who is the best between you and your friends and a Prop Hunt mode (not implemented yet) to discover or rediscover the best of the caches.

name: Tartaria: The forgotten tale
description: Tartaria is an original fairy-tale adventure game based on Slavic culture and Slavic mythology. Taking place around 900 A.D., you play a young prince who starts off protecting his Slavic principality from robbers, dark forces, and evil mythical beings using brawn, and magic.

name: Nargul: Humans are among us
description: Play in VR as a jovial but amnesiac alien. Explore the environment and interact freely with the people. Solve objectives, fight and cross the courses to find the ultimate truth.

name: Touge Racers
description: Touge Racers is a single-play racing game. It is a race battle on the pass with the old car team that I met at the pass. A racing game where you can drift down a winding road.

name: Monster X
description: New dangers have emerged. Mutated and powerful monsters are destroying our city. We must take action! Use a total of 4 weapons (Gun Sword / Gauntlets / Cannon / Bow) to fight with the enemy, flexibly use props, collect monster materials, modified weapons and defeat your enemy!

name: Spellhearts
description: Play as a novice warlock in a fantastical magic town and receive quests from an array of sexy NPCs (and attempt to court them). If you enjoy dating sims, adventure games, adult content, parody/comedy, fantasy settings, and the occult, you will indeed have a good time with this unique casual game.

name: Farlife
description: Farlife is a class-based action RPG set in space. Play as different alien species, each with their own unique abilities! Explore open worlds, Discover alien life, upgrade your arsenal, and fumble your way through the cosmos.

name: ASV Trident
description: You are the acting captain of the last war vessel of humanity. Now the ship is your home and refuge. "real-time roguelike spaceship sim"

name: Complex Relations
description: Complex Relations is an erotic romance visual novel in three perspectives, exploring three unique protagonists' experience of love, sex, change and growth.

name: Small Island
description: Small Island is an upcoming first-person exploration game where you have to escape the small mysterious Island you find yourself on. The game consists mainly in exploring the secret rooms and areas you'll find inside of it.

name: Hyperball Tachyon
description: High-speed momentum platforming action! Dash up walls and shoot off ramps to get to the finish!

name: PriOne
description: Prione is an open-world, Third-person survival game. It also contains elements of horror, adventure, and puzzle-solving that create a hardcore gaming experience. The game is difficult but not overkill; surviving isn’t supposed to be easy.

name: Engineer Alpha
description: Engineer Alpha is an open world survival and automation game. It combines an infinite editable world, building and connecting of automated machinery into complex assembly lines, with RPG style player progression.

name: Personal Trainer Simulator
description: A lighthearted, humorous and educational sim in which you take on the role of both nutritionist and health guru while overseeing and guiding your clients towards accomplishing their fitness goals.

name: Global Pandemic
description: Can you survive in a world with Zombies and Dinosaurs? Craft. Build. Survive. Create your own adventure!

name: Roads of Destiny
description: Play as a sorcerer. No swords, bows and arrows, knives or spears, just magic! Walk the path as a sorcerer, fight enemies, explore the world and stop a new circle of ancient prophecy.

name: Void Soul Awakening
description: Void Soul Awakening is a hack and slash inspired roguelite shooter. You will be thrown into the shoes....well....feet, of an immortal vessel as it fights it's way through an undead prison with the intent to escape.

name: MoveUp
description: Overwhelmed and want to escape the stresses of daily life, Move Up can help you unwind as you catch a well-deserved break. Power on your VR equipment and step into the game, where the simple task of stacking blocks can evoke the deepest and most satisfying feelings of accomplishment and relaxation.

name: Philosopher's Stone and Minerva
description: It is a world where the human world and the demon world coexist. The demon king, "Orkus", defeats the former king and takes the current king away. The warrior Minerva goes to the Demon King's castle to bring back the king. Will Minerva and Merus be able to protect the world?

name: There's no way that tsundere girl I met in the infirmary will be my girlfriend
description: "B-baka! Who said you could get in!? I'm not prepared yet!" "Oh well... since you're already here, why not stay for a while?" "D-don't misunderstand, okay? It's not like I asked you to stay because I like you or anything..."

name: Airplane Arena
description: A fun, high paced multiplayer airplane game with realistic physics. Turn on your controller, enter the arena with up to three enemies and be the best pilot out there! The amounts of hits, kills and death decide who is victorious. A great game to play with your friends or with other players online!

name: Honey Villa
description: You play as a hacker who lives alone in a villa. In a rainy night, there was a knock on the door. after opening the door, a beautiful girl fainted in front of the door. She was just drunk. The hacker took the girl into the house for the night. The next morning he girl suggested sharing the house...

name: Endlanders
description: Build your deck, glitch through enemies, translate unknown languages and decipher the mysteries of this universe, in this grid-based real time combat indie game. Endlanders features two main characters with diverging storylines in the same universe, fighting their way through unknown planes.

name: Manacircle
description: Manacircle is a combat adventure game about exploring the deep unknown and solve the problem in a way. Unique characters and strong enemies will test your skill. The journey to find the true meaning of Manacircle has begin!

name: Lost in Place
description: Pilot a delicate little ship through a variety of environments. Collect the coins, compete with friends, and try not to crash!

name: Skiing VR
description: Ski anytime you want on perfectly designed slopes in VR. Find your way to the finish line in this arcade ski simulator and prove that you're the best skier! Enjoy different game modes alone or with your friends

name: End it, please...
description: End it, please ... is a casual and challenging sci-fi platformer game where you have to find your ship to escape.

name: Pizza Arena
description: Finally fighting and cooking action as a local multiplayer game combined! Pizza Arena is a chaotic, competitive Cook’n’Slash party game for the whole family - and friends. Kill monsters, collect ingredients, bake pizzas and satisfy the spectators with delicious pizza!

name: Potions!
description: Brew and sell potions to customers during the day - prep during the night. Drink potions to survive your enemies and the harsh elements! Unlock spells to help serve the ever increasing demand. And move on to the next town in search of new ingredients, recipes and spells...

name: Galactic Racing Online
description: Galactic Racing Online is an arcade style fast paced 3D futuristic racing game. Compete against 12 other players in online multiplayer, or race against AI in single player, with over 28+ tracks and 200+ vehicles to unlock.

name: Rise of Stars
description: Fight in the endless war for resource in the vast universe. Explore the galaxy to find resource-rich planets, defeat enemies stationed in, mine planets, expand your power and conquer the galaxy. Become the greatest conqueror of the universe right now.

name: Go Run a Dungeon
description: Your evil overlord has handed you a dungeon to run. Recruit minions and fight off meddling adventurers. Pass inspections from the overlord to keep your dungeon open for business.

name: Hyperstrix
description: Hyperstrix is an arcade indie rail shooter that puts you in control of a spaceship.

name: Anime Parkour War
description: Are you ready to dance and fight with anime girls in this evil and dark world? action awaits you.

name: Shroomscape Zone
description: Shroomscape Zone is a beautiful and also surreal action shooting game with light platforming and puzzle elements. It utilizes realistic ballistics with honest physics simulation, hit-scan is not allowed!

name: Neon Racer
description: Endless road, neon lights, palm trees. The game immerses you in the atmosphere of retrowave. Welcome to Neon Racer! Neon Racer is a car simulator game in which you drive along the endless road and avoid other cars.

name: Hunter A Hunter
description: Hunter A Hunter is an Action Horror Arena game inspired by Pacman. Instead of eating pills while hiding from ghosts with top-down view, Hunter A Hunter is you (as a sinner) playing first/third-person view to collect all lights scattered in arena while a hunter is searching for you.

name: Furry Hentai Quest
description: The world of Klytoria is in danger! Will you be able to make it far away enough from the castle? Using your choice of Hentai, Furry, or human characters you must eschew obstacles and carefully navigate the lands... Can you save Klytoria?

name: Gehena
description: Gehena is a single-player first-person horror game. The only way out of the cursed town is to make the right choice and not get caught in the fog. Is what you see real or is your mind playing tricks on you?

name: Azrael
description: Azrael is a first-person Detective/Horror Game in which you play as a detective capable of reliving crime scenes. Explore different environments, find clues and try to find out who is the serial killer in a murder case among a group of friends.

name: A Factory Job
description: A short psychological horror game

name: Find the Murderer 2
description: The director's body was found in the office. It looks like a suicide but the detective has a different opinion.

name: Nefarium
description: Hack and slash your way through the floors of Nefarium in this ARPG. Go through randomly generated dungeons as difficulty increases with each floor; defeat vengeful monsters, upgrade unique items, define your own playstyle, and reach the furthest depths to become stronger than ever.

name: Villager comes alive
description: building up you own village and defence it

name: Legacy Quest 2
description: Legacy Quest 2 is a 2D side-scrolling platform game. Jump and slide your way through challenging and fun levels to collect gemstones, while avoiding obstacles and enemies.

name: Air Racing VR
description: This is an air Parkour game combined with VR. You need to fly the plane to cross the obstacles and reach the end at the fastest speed. In addition to man-machine racing, you can also race online in the air. Call friends to join the game.

name: Infinite Construction
description: This is an infinite sandbox construction game with no boundaries. The game is simulating the reconstruction of a post-war town; there are 18 kinds of resources in the game, and the construction strategy is to increase the resources and maintain the dynamic balance of different resources.

name: Quickflash: A Fabula Story
description: A strategy, turn-based fantasy game in the worlds of darkness and light.

name: Dungeon Blocks
description: Dungeon Blocks is a block pushing puzzle game inspired by the classics Binary Land and Sokoban. Control two adventurers at the same time. Guide them through deadly dungeons on their quest to defeat the Demon Lord!

name: Eigen Space
description: Escape the Eigen Space in this fast paced auto runner, shooter looter, rouge lite game with a story to make you doubt what is reality.

name: Razed Earth
description: A first person sandbox shooter, where you can fight in either the sky above or on the ground. Customise your plane's arsenal how you want it. Build a loadout tailored to your play style. Razed Earth is a simple yet liberating sandbox experience built to be played by anyone.

name: Back 2 School
description: Back 2 School is a trivia game with challenging primary school questions that the player must answer to graduate from elementary school. Are you smart enough to pass elementary school? Play Back 2 School today and work out those brain muscles!

name: Headup Adventure Bundle
description: Enjoy three exciting adventure games in this bundle!

name: Big Toddlers and Kids Bundle
description: This bundle contains nine top games for toddlers and kids. Hours of educational and relaxing fun with puzzles, matching pairs, popping balloons, washing cars and more!

name: Educational and Learning Bundle: 5 in 1
description: This bundle contains five of top educational games for toddlers and kids. Hours of fun learning with puzzles, popping balloons, matching pairs and more!

name: Elo 1100 Chess
description: Play from beginners level to top level ELO 1100 (very good level, if you beat your device here, respect!) in this high quality Chess Game Engine.

name: Zoo Squad
description: Zoo Squad is a multiplayer party brawler for 4 players.You will win by fighting your friends using a variety of cute animals.

name: Dark Magic 2
description: Magic in hand and forward. Only you can stop the explosion of dark matter in the universe!

name: The Fall of Balance
description: The Fall of Balance is a VR, fantasy game focused on colossal boss fights, each with various mechanics, like climbing, character skills, and others.

name: Dann Fox & the Time Machine
description: A third person platformer with fast paced combat, beautiful cartoon graphics and challenging levels that explore different time periods in History! Upgrade your character and use a variety of weapons to fight enemies and bosses!

name: Satogaeri
description: Satogaeri is a J-horror walking simulator game set in rural Japan in the late summer of the 2000s.

name: The Devils: A Visual Novel of WWII
description: A graphic novel about a true life horror story rooted at the end of World War II.

name: Dark Magician
description: Dark Magician is a 2d platform game with the story of a protagonist who has his disciple kidnapped by a dark magician. The game consists of the search for your apprentice, traveling through different environments facing numerous enemies and traps.

name: Feed the Pets: Fall Animals
description: Feed the Pets: Fall Animals is a cute clicker where you shall feed the pets, and make them happy!

name: End Party
description: Can you keep 5 characters alive for one hour? Whack zombies. Barricade doors. Lead NPCs around. And smash stuff!

name: Daydreamer 2
description: Sci-fi 3rd person hack n slash with a classic top-down tank shooter component.

name: SpacePom
description: Join space-faring Pomeranian SpacePom on a mission to investigate a derelict spaceship. Using only your trusty jetpack and toolbox, make your way through the spaceship Halen in this sci-fi platformer and find answers along the way.

name: Starboard
description: Build a base or raid someone else's in this fantasy pirate survival game.

name: Atomic Cyclecar Racing
description: Atomic Cyclecar Racing is a sci-fi arcade racing game inspired by games like Extreme-G, Beetle Adventure Racing, and F-Zero.

name: Hobble
description: Hobble is a 1-8 player hiking game. Take control of a senior citizen setting off on a bucket list trip.

name: Underworld Dreams: The False King
description: Underworld Dreams: The False King is the first game in the Underworld Dreams Anthology - the first-person horror series based in the Lovecraftian mythos. Inspired by the works of Lovecraft and Robert W Chambers and set in the 1980s, it sets the stage for the Underworld Dreams experience.

name: Cat Follow Me
description: Cat Action Adventure! Find lost cats in the forest and bring them home!

name: A Moustache in the House 2
description: This time you have to escape Moustache's House

name: Victorian Debutante
description: Simple visual novel in which you play as a young upperclass woman preparing for her debut before the Queen and her royal relatives. All of your decisions lead to one of four very different endings. Who will you become? The jewel of the season or the outcast, never again mentioned by your family?

name: Parkonauts
description: Parkonauts is a physics-based co-op game for one to four players. Park cars, refuel and wash them to collect money for the next day!

name: Witch Club
description: Fall in love with three eccentric witches and one mischievous fairy as you battle alongside them as a cursed skull! Help them grow and come to terms with their past as they feast, drink, and fight to fulfill their dreams!

name: Push Ops
description: PushOps is a roguelike with a twist: There are no weapons! As a player, you must manipulate physics objects to survive. Fast moving blocks will deal damage.

name: Let's go to the moon
description: It is a 2D platform casual arcade game that succeeds when you step on a block from the ground and reach the moon. Will you be able to go up to the moon?

name: The Office Type
description: Add love to your resume! Date a wide variety of characters at once and explore dozens of narratives in this office-themed comedy dating sim.

name: Wordies
description: Wordies is bringing a word game you've most likely played & enjoyed to Steam. But it's harder than before, with only 5 guesses you're given the not so easy task of guessing a common American word! Guess the daily word & build up highstreaks to compete against the world in our global leaderboards!

name: Tinker & Spell
description: Capture elemental spirits to add to your arsenal and uncover the mysteries of a fantasy land in this hand-drawn Creature-Collecting Metroidvania.

name: A Legend In Zormore
description: A tale of courage and friendship. Catch creatures called Zelds. Raise them. Train them. Use them for battle! You will be aided by your deck of cards, built around your own strategy. Can you overcome the challenge and save the world?

name: Structus
description: Discover-Explore-Look Sci-Fi platformer in a forgotten dimension

name: Feral
description: A first person hunting and survival game for Windows

name: Cellings
description: Experience the full evolution of cells across 3 generations and explore breathtaking worlds.

name: Toastling
description: To a Starling, but it's a mean map mod.

name: Shepherd
description: Watch over the flock!

name: Ablaze Ascent
description: A speedrunning-focused vertical precision platformer

name: Showdown
description: 1 or 2 player c64 action shooter!

name: Love's Power Mahjong
description: Put your Mahjong skills to the test and save Ariel's fiancé, Tarlan, from captivity by the evil wizard Cornwall! Stolen from the altar on their wedding day, poor Tarlan has been taken deep into the Country of Four Seasons. Meet a whole cast of crazy characters as you help Ariel go on an exciting journey and explore the world of Love's Power Mahjong! Can you track down Tarlan and defeat Cornwall before it's too late?

name: Twin Circle
description: Test your skill with twin circle, the ultimate strategy, fast paced game were you need a lot of skill to hit the target every time!

name: Trains.io
description: Sin descripción

name: Hurdles
description: Sin descripción

name: Combat Space Journey
description: Combat Space Journey is a very beautiful game exploring space and space battles all in one game. You would have so much fun.

name: Narrative Adventure
description: Narrative Adventure is a game in which the player has to discover the mysteries of the house, solve riddles

name: Rtisatto City Defender
description: This is an intense combat game inspired by the classics of the 80s, mixing defense of towers and ships with 2D arcade. Defend the cities of a primitive planet from attacks by space pirates using a mobile artillery cannon.

name: The Time Watcher
description: Sin descripción

name: MS: Space Express
description: MS: Space Expressis a miniscape-style casual game. Players play the role of space couriers, earn money by reselling private goods after completing business orders, and experience the joy of space delivery.

name: HellFull: The Last Hope
description: Immerse yourself in a unique post-apocalyptic world that has now become Hell on earth. Destroy your enemies with a variety of weapons, ranging from Pistols to Assault Rifles. Explore to look for survivors, health kits and hidden zones. If you die, you have to start over just like the real deal!

name: Treasure Sprinter
description: In every adventure film, there is always a scene: the hero finally obtains the treasure, but has to walk through the maze of traps in order to leave alive. Temple run is such a scenario. This game is very interesting

name: Erannorth Chronicles: Ancient Ruins
description: Experience a richer, more distinct and dangerous world with the first Erannorth Chronicles expansion. "Ancient Ruins" will expand the world seamlessly with new Challenges, events, deadly bosses and new loot; suitable for mid to high level characters.

name: Midnight Terror: The Beginning
description: Ethan, um agente da SWAT entra na prefeitura de uma cidade infestada de monstros com a missão de encontrar sobreviventes ao ataque de um vírus desconhecido. Jogo indie de Survivor Horror em 3ª Pessoa feito por uma única pessoa no motor gráfico Unreal Engine 4.

name: Light, Dark or Hrak?
description: A simple hard worker living in the village of Zalupkino is doing his job, when suddenly there are power outages in the village, by a lucky chance our hero has an electrician pig and the right tool, taking a tractor, they went to look for a malfunction at the substation, what could go wrong?

name: Isolate
description: You, who needed money, will participate in a secret biological experiment. You will play a 'Game' in a huge cellar for two weeks and have to survive the attack of numerous 'Entities'. What are those 'Entities', and who is waiting at the top of the cellar?

name: Death Damnation
description: Death Damnation is a Twitch connected game developed for streamers. You and your community are in charge of controlling the paranormal events and dreadful monsters. Be sure that your viewers are on your side to escape death, otherwise you will have a bad time.

name: Hero for Hire
description: Open world RPG where every quest is small puzzle.

name: Ts Fantasy
description: Date with Cute Girls as you save people! This is new Adventure Visual Novel game!! Explore Ts Fantasy, and save the world using your special powers and with the help of your friends. Your relationship with characters differs according to the choices you make!!

name: Last Lovers
description: This is a visual novel about the doomsday zombie.This work is a multi line and multi ending eschatological love song and a visual novel of all age love.

name: Plumb
description: A room-scale VR narrative puzzle game. Solve spatial puzzles under strict time constraints. Assemble and properly combine an assortment of 3d shapes into predefined spaces.

name: Zombie Exodus: Safe Haven - Part Three
description: Zombie Exodus: Safe Haven: Part Three continues your story as you leave your hilltop outside Nightfall, Colorado with your group of survivors and travel to a new haven, a rural junkyard.

name: Brave Princess Milia
description: This is a RPG where protagonist has been set up and killed by the arrogant Brave Princess,Milia.Wanted to seek revenge,the protagonist has found a way to possess Milia. You are able to travel,fight monsters and enjoy various event around this fantasy world by controlling the strongest hero.

name: VR Mini World Roller Coaster
description: This game is a casual game, players can experience a different roller coaster ride with a helmet. Players can control the running speed of the roller coaster by themselves, which can not only experience the thrill at high speed, but also stop to enjoy the beautiful scenery.

name: Get Off My Space!
description: Get Off My Space! is a tower defense game where you rely on skillful tower placement and resource management to beat upcoming dangers of the galaxy. Combining strategy and micro managing fire groups you will overcome the hardest level objectives.

name: Village of Zombies: Tropical
description: This DLC includes an additional weapon, 4 additional characters and a new map that can be played with up to 6 players in online co-op or solo in single player.

name: Labyrinth DeLux: A Crusoe Quest
description: Solve 16 mind bending puzzles by guiding a laser beam through a maze of mirrors and prisms. Walk on walls and ceilings through a unique magnetic shoe locomotion. Enjoy a funny frame story between a female space trucker and her overly correct AI companion.

name: Dark Haunting
description: A multiplayer co-op horror game.

name: Under Iron Water
description: A first person adventure game with light platforming elements. On an island, somewhere in the ocean, a powerful creature has been captured but is slowly gaining power. It sends it's minions across the island to spread it's influence, one such location being the old village crypt, where you awaken.

name: Fruit Legacy
description: Fruit Legacy - A click-and-click game where the player, by choosing a certain color of the knife, must cut falling fruit and accumulate bonuses that allow the player to progress through the level. Fruits have the ability to mutate into new variations, where they are combined into several pieces.

name: Cruise Ship Horse Racing
description: Cruise Ship Horse Racing is a fun, exciting horse racing and wagering simulation game for players of all ages. Test your luck, watch the races, and win reward art in this engaging immersive tribute to the actual game played on passenger ocean liners for over a 100 years.

name: Breaking Newton
description: No more jumping, change gravity as you wish to overcome more than 100 stages in the shortest time possible.

name: Bathtime Toys
description: A creative playground for kids. Assemble simple, but cute 3d puzzle toys to play with. Express yourself by coloring them, and decorate your bathtub. No hard rules to win or lose.

name: Project Valkyrie
description: "Project Valkyrie" is history that you have to see for youself

name: Small Crystal
description: This is a fantasy roguelike adventure where you play as a hero who goes to save the world. Explore forbidden lands, unlock new heroes with different abilities, use different weapons to kill powerful monsters.

name: Block Dropper
description: A unique, fast-paced platformer where only you can save the world from total destruction.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Ultimate Bundle
description: A bundle with a variety of Sonic the Hedgehog games.

name: Coloring Game 4: Dinosaurs
description: The thirteenth DLC for Coloring Game 4. The theme of this DLC is Dinosaurs.

name: Coloring Game 4: Winter
description: The theme of this DLC is Winter.

name: Coloring Game 4: City
description: The fifteenth DLC for Coloring Game 4. The theme of this DLC is Urban.

name: Coloring Game 4: Summer
description: The seventeenth DLC for Coloring Game 4. The theme of this DLC is Summer.

name: Coloring Game 4: Halloween
description: The fourteenth DLC for Coloring Game 4. The theme of this DLC is Halloween.

name: Town of Destruction
description: A person who comes home meets his own town is broken. He needs you to help him find the key point of the broken town and restore the town to its original state.

name: A white horse is not a horse
description: Cultivate immortals to pursue the avenue, or raise spirit animals, plant spirit plants, find spirit objects, or complete the so-called destiny, find the way home, find longevity, find the avenue, explore the boundless world of the universe, fight with immortals in mythology.

name: Idle Paladin
description: Hack and slash, loot, and explore new regions in the Incremental RPG - Idle Paladin! Battle your way through enemies, find new equipment, and unlock new skills for your characters. How strong can you get?

name: Combat Troops VR
description: Combat Troops VR is a fast and dynamic shooter game. Practice coordination, teamwork, and survival skills on battlefields. Handle, modyfy, aim and reload your weapon with real-life movements.

name: Inanis
description: Take a pilgrimage to slay the King and repeal the poison over the kingdom. Create a custom deck with over 100 cards and engage in grid based tactics gameplay to defeat a slew of diverse bosses. Master your deck, uncover the darkness, kill the King.

name: Come Alive!
description: when the campy horror movie you're watching with your crush comes to life, will you be able to survive the night?

name: Last Hour
description: Fight in multiplayer on small maps in a team of up to 6 players against other teams for victory in the infamous Team Deathmatch mode or use the shooting range to test your skills. Uses a selection of different modern weapons and equipment.

name: Tokyo Detectives: Case 02
description: This is the Case 02 Complete: Red Wedding for Tokyo Detectives.

name: Tokyo Detectives: Case 01
description: This is the Case 01 Complete: Murder in Akihabara for Tokyo Detectives.

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Dragons 2
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Raging Bridgehead
description: On August 8, 1941, at 10:00 after an artillery barrage, 1TD was launched an offensive on the bridgehead near Bol.Sabsk. German tanks and infantry attacked at the junction of 286 and 173IR 90RD, in the direction of Peleshi. An offensive in this direction came as a surprise to the Red Army units.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Operation Victory
description: First major Iranian counteroffensive named Operation "Nasr" in Khuzestan region in January 1981. The main role in the operation was assigned to the 16 and 92ArmBde units. Also, IRGC and militia units were brought to participate in the operation.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Pivot Point
description: In mid-December 1942, under the onslaught of the Soviet 44A, elements of the German 3TD were forced to leave Ischerskaya and retreat to the second defense line to Tomazov and Shefatov.

name: DoomsDay
description: DoomsDay is a faction-based, PvPvE survival game set in Kentucky. Players will choose a Faction and work with, or compete against, other players to contribute to that Faction's collection of resources.

name: Punch It Deluxe
description: Relax, De-stress, and unwind your day in this simple and violent arcade game. Release your rage while the relief washes over you as you PUNCH, PULL, and TWIST your enemies (who, let's face it, probably deserved it).

name: Escape the room
description: This is a pixel leisure game for puzzle solving and room escape lovers. Players can operate by mouse click or keyboard. The whole game needs to find clues and crack puzzle to escape the secret room.

name: Enherjar Synergy: Aplankhan & Sioykos
description: This DLC contain unlock 2 characters, Aplankhan and Sioykos

name: Interceptor
description: Take part in an atmospheric sci-fi horror game and stay alive in the last stronghold, the Cathedral. Arise, develop your character, gear up, fight soulless enemies and face the mighty Baron.

name: The Gift
description: Horror point and click game. You play as an administrator who will have to try to survive in in a closed hotel full of traps and terrible creatures. To move along the plot, the player will have to solve puzzles for attentiveness and find letters left by a stranger.

name: Football, Tactics & Glory: Manager's Journey
description: Start a career as a manager who is completely unknown and hired and fired by clubs depending on their results. Raise your reputation, earn experience, discover new abilities and move to stronger and stronger clubs.

name: Retro Golden Age: The Abbey of Crime
description: Get ordained in The Abbey of Crime and solve the dangerous mystery that has been hidden among the dark pages of history for more than five centuries. Become friar Guillermo de Mosce and return to your order to discover the reasons why you were imprisoned by the Holy Inquisition.

name: Creatures: Docking Station - Creatures 3
description: Creatures 3 represents some of the most advanced artificial life available. The Norns, Grendels and Ettins behave as if they are really alive. Explore a vast living spaceship, discover incredible machines, and defend your Norns against vicious, hunting Grendels and some of nature's worst creations.

name: Goonya Fighter: Super Untouchable Goonya Fighters!!
description: This DLC adds the new battle style "Super Untouchable Goonya Fighters!!".
